column1: npw # Perturbation order with respect to wave steepness
nswavex # Number of wavelength in x direction of domain
aka # amp = aka / nswavex/pex_hos = aka * Lambda_x / twopi

column2: dimensional wind velocity at 10 meter height

column1: ist_hos # whether to consider surface tension
sigma # one of many versions: sigma=(nswavex*pex_hos/fr2)**0.5
